areas.query:
PREFIX geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>


select distinct  ?naam (?persoon as ?uri)
where
{
  []<http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#tenNameVan> ?persoon.
  ?persoon <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?naam
      
}

PREFIX geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT distinct  (?perceel as ?uri) ?geometry ?label ?color

WHERE {
  
  ?perceel a <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#Perceel> .
  ?perceel <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#begrenzing>/geo:asWKT ?geometry.
  ?eigendom <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#rustOp> ?perceel.
  ?tn <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#van> ?eigendom.
  ?tn <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#tenNameVan> ?persoon.
 
    <script>
    if ("{{tnv}}"=="http://www.buildingbits.nl/reset") {return "";}
    else
    {
     return "filter (<{{tnv}}>=?persoon) "
     }
    </script>
   ?persoon rdfs:label ?persoonLabel.
 
  optional {

    ?eigendomV2 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#rustOp> ?perceel.
  filter (?eigendom!=?eigendomV2)
     ?tn2 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#van> ?eigendomV2.
   ?tn2 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#tenNameVan> ?persoon2.
  ?persoon2 rdfs:label ?persoonLabel2.
      ?persoon rdfs:label ?persoonLabel.
    bind (concat (?persoonLabel," en ",?persoonLabel2) as ?temp)
}
 
    optional
  {
      
  
    ?eigendomV2 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#rustOp> ?perceel.
    ?eigendomV3 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#rustOp> ?perceel.
  filter (?eigendom!=?eigendomV2)
    filter (?eigendom!=?eigendomV3)filter (?eigendomV2!=?eigendomV3)
 ?tnV2 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#van> ?eigendomV2.
   ?tnV2 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#tenNameVan> ?persoonV2.
  ?persoonV2 rdfs:label ?nameV2.
     ?tn3 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#van> ?eigendomV3.
   ?tn3 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#tenNameVan> ?persoon3.
  ?persoon3 rdfs:label ?name.
     
    ?persoon rdfs:label ?persoonLabel.
      bind (concat(?persoonLabel," , ",?nameV2," en ",?name) as ?temp2)
  }
  
 
    
  bind (if (bound(?temp2),?temp2,if (bound(?temp),?temp,?persoonLabel)) as ?label)
   bind (if (bound(?temp2),"3 eigenaren",if (bound(?temp),"2 eigenaren","1 eigenaar")) as ?color)
  
  
} 
#limit 16000
#title:Percelen;
#color:RGBA(0,0,255,1)@"1 eigenaar";
#color:RGBA(100,100,55,1)@"2 eigenaren";
#color:RGBA(100,200,55,1)@"3 eigenaren";

areas.title: Koopsom
areas.query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
prefix fn:<http://www.w3.org/2017/xpath-functions>
prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>


select distinct ?koopsom ?jaar

where
{
  
  <{{perceel}}> <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#laatsteKoopsom>/rdf:value ?koopsom3.
  bind (xsd:int(?koopsom3/1000000) as ?m)
  bind (xsd:int((?koopsom3-(?m*1000000))/1000) as ?d)
  bind (if (?m=0,concat(str(?d),".000 euro"),concat(str(?m),".",str(?d),".000 euro")) as ?koopsom)
  
 
   <{{perceel}}> <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#year> ?jaar.
   
 


}

PREFIX geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

select ?naam ?teller

where
{
   ?eigendom <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#rustOp> <{{perceel}}>.
      
      
  ?tn <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#van> ?eigendom.
       ?tn <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#teller> ?teller.
   ?tn <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#tenNameVan> ?persoon.
      ?persoon rdfs:label ?naam
}

PREFIX geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT distinct  (?perceel as ?uri) ?geometry ?label ?color
WHERE {
  
  ?perceel a <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#Perceel> .
  ?perceel <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-geo#begrenzing>/geo:asWKT ?geometry.
  ?eigendom <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#rustOp> ?perceel.
  ?tn <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#van> ?eigendom.
   ?tn <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#tenNameVan> ?persoon.
   ?persoon rdfs:label ?persoonLabel.
  optional {?eigendom2 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#rustOp> ?perceel.
  filter (?eigendom!=?eigendom2)
     ?tn2 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#van> ?eigendom2.
   ?tn2 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#tenNameVan> ?persoon2.
  ?persoon2 rdfs:label ?persoonLabel2.
    bind (concat (?persoonLabel," en ",?persoonLabel2) as ?temp)
    optional
  {
     ?eigendom3 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#rustOp> ?perceel.
  filter (?eigendom3!=?eigendom2) filter (?eigendom3!=?eigendom)
     ?tn3 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#van> ?eigendom3.
   ?tn3 <http://modellen.geostandaarden.nl/def/imx-brk#tenNameVan> ?persoon3.
  ?persoon3 rdfs:label ?name.
      bind (concat(?persoonLabel," , ",?persoonLabel2," en ",?name) as ?temp2)
  }
  }
  
  
  bind (if (bound(?temp2),?temp2,if (bound(?temp),?temp,?persoonLabel)) as ?label)
   bind (if (bound(?temp2),"3 eigenaren",if (bound(?temp),"2 eigenaren","1 eigenaar")) as ?color)
  
  
} 
limit 10000
